bgc.gui.proy.automat
Class PanelSemanal

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  bgc.gui.proy.automat.PanelSemanal
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class PanelSemanal
extends javax.swing.JPanel

La clase PanelSemanal ofrece la interfaz necesaria para escoger la periodicidad semanal del envío del mailing

Campus - Telematika, S.L.
